title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the TrafficInspector project, including the specific features, functionalities, performance criteria, security considerations, integration points with existing systems, and scalability and availability requirements.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for TrafficInspector, including the distributed components, communication protocols, data flow, scalability considerations, and security measures.

title: Plan Security Measures
description: Define and document the security measures and best practices to be implemented in TrafficInspector, including data encryption, access control, and threat mitigation strategies.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design the data storage and management components for TrafficInspector, including the database schema, data persistence strategies, data access mechanisms, and data security considerations.

title: Plan Deployment and Monitoring
description: Define the deployment strategies, monitoring tools, and infrastructure requirements for TrafficInspector in the distributed environment. Ensure that the deployment plan considers high availability, scalability, and fault tolerance. Identify the appropriate monitoring tools for tracking system health, performance, and security. Determine the infrastructure requirements, such as load balancers, databases, caching layers, and any other necessary components.
